reviews_data.review_text: Grace and company were so nice. I'm glad we got to experience this place. Awesome drinks and great vibes. My wife and I will definitely be back.

Wooden Robot was a really fun and quirky brewery, with great IPAs and an awesome outdoor setup. I loved the artwork that adorned the walls of the establishment, which even included a great piece of art in the restroom! Like I said, my IPA was great, and was just one of the many that the brewery had on the menu.

Overall, Wooden Robot was an awesome brewery, and I'd love to come back in the future to try some more of their brews!
Nice beers and good place

This place is incredible for Celiacs like me! My fiancé and walked in here during our vacation not knowing that almost ALL of the beers are gluten reduced - what an amazing surprise that was for me! I was able to try so many styles of beer (most for the first time ever) and had absolutely no gut issues or reactions afterwards.

For those who don't care about the gluten - my fiancé said there's no way he could tell the beers were gluten reduced, and he would definitely order them again if he saw them on the menu. 10/10, would recommend to anyone with gluten intolerance or Celiacs. I recommended the sours, especially True Survivor!

Wooden Robot is probably my favorite brewery in Charlotte for quite a long time; only second to Catawba Brewing which closed a couple of years ago. Good coffee in the mornings and great beer from the source taproom and all over Charlotte.
Good beer but expensive. Chill atmosphere.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're glad you enjoyed your visit, and we hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Still one of our favorite Charlotte breweries! Quality beer, delicious food and friendly knowledge staff. Don’t miss this gem when visiting the south end in Charlotte
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the wonderful review, Mark! We're thrilled to be one of your favorite Charlotte breweries, and we can't wait to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
This is a wonderful find.  A menu that splits between classic beer designs and experiments that work.   Food is fast, the
house is clean, and all of the vibes are strong.

After note.   I scrolled down and found their mission statement that eerily sounds like my review.   Mission accomplished team.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, thank you for the amazing review! We're so glad you enjoyed your visit, and we're thrilled that our core values really shone through during your time with us. Quality beer and food and great vibes are exactly what we strive for. We can't wait to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: I got a coconut shaken espresso with lavender cold foam (called Toucan play at this game-like toucan Sam) and a bacon egg and cheese on a biscuit-both literally so good and staff was so friendly!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the wonderful review, Caroline! We're so glad you enjoyed breakfast and coffee - the Toucan Play at This Game is one of our favorites, too! We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
Pretty cool spot. The seating area itself is abundant with tons of options and is definitely worth hanging out in. Could definitely see playing corn hole or a board game here. The staff were super nice, attentive, and willing to answer any questions. The beer itself was fine, there were 3 IPA options and I didn't love any of them but they were decent. But they had a fairly nice selection of beers otherwise with non-beer options, as well. So it probably would be good for a group of diverse beer tastes.

Worth stopping in at.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the thoughtful review! We're so glad you enjoyed your visit and that our staff helped make your experience even better. We would be thrilled to have you back soon to try one of our seasonal beer releases - we keep our menu fresh and exciting, and hope to find a beer that's just right for you next time!

reviews_data.review_text: Fantastic drinks and great vibe inside. They only serve food on certain days, just FYI. But the muffins available all day are also really good.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and for the 5-star rating! We're glad to hear you enjoyed the drinks and vibe at our coffee bar. We hope you'll join us again soon for breakfast on Friday 8 AM - 11 AM and Saturday/Sunday 9 AM - 11 AM!

reviews_data.review_text:
Love the vibe!!! Love the beer!! We live in Western NC- a beer mega hub, and we would rate Wooden Robot right up there with Western NC. It was fantastic! We went to both locations via the light rail.
The Noda location is great for beer, but if you want food you’ll need to purchase from whatever food truck is scheduled that day. Whereas the Southend location has a small menu.
We will return again anytime we are in Charlotte!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the wonderful review! We're thrilled you had the chance to visit both of our taprooms while you were in town, and we're honored to be mentioned alongside our friends in WNC. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in Charlotte!

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped by super early and ordered a beer from the coffee bar area. This is a really nice brewery with friendly service and a comfy atmosphere.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for stopping by, Jennifer! We're glad you enjoyed your visit and hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great atmosphere with great food and brews.  Staff were super cool as well.  Picked up this awesome taster glass.  They sell all their glassware and other cool merch.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the kind words! We're glad you enjoyed the atmosphere, food, and beer - and that our staff helped make your visit even better. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Fantastic Burger!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the 5-star review, Doug! We agree that our Signature Burger is pretty fantastic! :)

reviews_data.review_text: The beers are delicious and so is the coffee. Get the Snack Time. You won't be disappointed.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the awesome review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the Snack Time - a blueberry pie inspired coffee is the perfect summer treat! We're glad our beers hit the spot, too. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing selection of beers. Wish there were more to go options in cans. :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting and for the 5-star review! Check back in our taprooms soon for more options in 6-packs, or grab a 32 oz crowler of any of our beers on tap!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place, ended up here after a work conference. Everyone was friendly, and the food was great.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us and enjoyed the food! Thank you for the support and for leaving a review!

reviews_data.review_text: Love the brewery and the beer, but parking is a nightmare 😫
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing a beer with us and for the 5-star review! We agree, parking in and around South End can be difficult at times, but we're thankful to have the parking lot across the patio available for guests to park, along with free 2-hour street parking! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
5 Stars!
Judomaster was smooth, bold, and easy to enjoy. Huge thanks to Coffee S. for the great service and the unexpected 3/4 pour when the keg ran out—above and beyond. Always grateful to support places that value craft and connection.

Thai Chili Shrimp 🍤 on point
"Pharmacist Recommended" - EtOH in moderation of course
reviews_data.owner_answer: Justin, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us. Thank you for the support and for leaving a review! Our staff works hard to keep up with all our thirsty guests, so we appreciate your kind words towards them and our Kitchen offerings.

reviews_data.review_text:
Wooden Robot Brewery is a gem in the heart of the city, offering an exceptional selection of craft beers that cater to both seasoned aficionados and newcomers alike. From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere, complete with rustic wooden accents and a lively vibe that makes it an ideal spot for socializing or unwinding after a long day.

One standout beer is their "Ghost in the Machine," a New England IPA that boasts a hazy appearance and a burst of tropical fruit aromas. Each sip delivers a delightful balance of juicy hops and a smooth mouthfeel, making it dangerously drinkable. The citrus and stone fruit flavors linger pleasantly, leaving you eager for another round.

The brewery also offers a rotating lineup of seasonal brews, including stouts, sours, and lagers, ensuring that there’s always something new to try. The knowledgeable staff are more than happy to guide you through their offerings and recommend food pairings from their onsite food trucks, which complement the beer perfectly.

In addition to the outstanding beer, Wooden Robot Brewery frequently hosts fun events, from trivia nights to live music, creating a sense of community that keeps patrons coming back. Whether you're stopping in for a quick pint or planning a leisurely afternoon with friends, Wooden Robot Brewery is a must-visit destination for anyone looking to experience top-notch craft beer in a friendly and welcoming environment.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you so much for the kind and thoughtful review! We’re honored to be called a “gem” and truly appreciate you taking the time to share such detailed feedback. It means a lot to hear that you enjoyed the atmosphere, our ever-changing lineup of beers.

We’re passionate about creating a welcoming space where folks can enjoy great beer, good food, and memorable moments together, and we’re so glad that came through in your visit. We hope to see you again soon for another round (or two)! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Great service, great beer. Limited menu, think hamburgers and chicken sandwiches and fries, but very well executed
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and for the 5-star rating!

reviews_data.review_text: I would recommend great place to have fun but also great food and so many good places to eat around it  also have a run club to
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the fantastic review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your visit. We're glad our beer menu and Kitchen offerings hit the spot. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Came here with a large group and got an extremely poor reaction from the bartender. Super uninviting and felt like a bother. We probably won’t return.
Beer was cold and at a good price for a brewery in South End. Would like to see a larger beer selection given the size of the brewery.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for stopping by and for sharing your feedback! We're glad to hear you enjoyed your visit. While we may look big on the outside, we're actually a small, but mighty craft brewery focused on brewing intentionally small batches that rotate often. This allows us to keep things fresh, experiment with new styles, and highlight seasonal ingredients we’re excited about. We hope you'll swing back soon—there's always something new on tap to discover!

reviews_data.review_text: My favorite brewery! As someone who is gluten free this is a hidden GEM!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Connor, thank you for the 5-star review and for sharing a little bit about our beer! Many people don't know that we use an enzyme in most of our beers that significantly reduces gluten content, so our beers are considered “gluten-reduced”! We’re so glad to hear you enjoy our brewery! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Really good vanilla golden coffee ale.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're glad to hear you really like our Good Morning Vietnam Coffee Vanilla Blonde Ale! We hope we can make it a 5-star experience for you the next you visit. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Matt gave water and a smile to my drunk friend. Amazing human.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us-- shout out to Matt! Our staff works hard to keep up with all our thirsty guests, so we appreciate your kind words and amazing review. We hope you’ll stop by again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Nice, sizeable open-air brewery with good beer and food.  Service is very good as is the atmosphere.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! We're glad to hear you enjoyed the atmosphere and and our customer service. We look forward to serving you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Nice spot, beers were good and great service.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Chuck, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us. Thank you for the support and for leaving a review!

reviews_data.review_text: fantastic all around.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving an all around fantastic review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: AMAZING pour over and lattes, environment is welcoming and chill. Great place and people!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting our Coffee Bar, sharing your experience, and leaving a 5-star review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Wooden Robot was a nice brewery experience. It was pretty busy on a Thursday night with tons of corporate meetups it looked like. There was a large tap list and plenty of space/food options  as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Jeremy! Sounds like you caught us on a busy night, but we're happy to hear you had a great time.

reviews_data.review_text: Great beer and even better vibes. One of my favorite breweries in Charlotte
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Michael! We appreciate your 5-star review and the kind words towards our beer and vibes! We hope to serve you a cold beer again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Loved the vibe of this place and the beers. Got the flight and EVERYTHING was super tasty. My fave was Return to Juice. Just a great space to hang out.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed the vibe, the beers, and especially Return to Juice — it's a house favorite around here too. A flight and some good hangs is exactly what we're all about. Hope to see you back again soon for another round! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Came here for a quick drink with my wife and it was really nice.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by with you wife and leaving a review! We hope to serve you both again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Absolutely fantastic coffee spot! The atmosphere inside is warm and inviting, with a stylish loft-style interior that makes it a great place to relax or get some work done. The staff is incredibly friendly and welcoming, which adds to the overall experience.

The coffee here is top-notch. I first ordered a cappuccino along with some crab cakes, and both were absolutely delicious. Later, I decided to try a cortado, and it was just as excellent.

Highly recommend this place if you appreciate great coffee and a cozy ambiance!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed both the coffee and the atmosphere—creating a cozy, welcoming space with top-notch drinks is exactly what we aim for. Our team will be so happy to hear your feedback. We truly appreciate your recommendation and can’t wait to welcome you back soon—whether it’s to relax, work, or simply enjoy another great cup.

reviews_data.review_text:
Parking beside the brewery that shows paid IS NOT the breweries parking - their free lot is somewhere across the street from the front doors. Never found it.

The beer we had was very good & like the location. Afternoon & people were ordering lunch - all served on paper baskets w plastic spools - pet peeve of mine: not having real plates & cutlery.  Washing is better than wasting & filling up landfills.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thanks for taking the time to leave a thoughtful review! We're glad to hear you enjoyed the beer and the taproom. 
We appreciate you letting other people know about parking around South End—it can definitely be a bit tricky. Our free lot is located directly across the street from our main patio on Summit Ave along with free 2-hour parking on the street! 
Thanks again for visiting, and we hope to see you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
Bless this brüry, it's easily my second favorite as far as the independents go. They have a spectacular kitchen, and their signature Good Morning Vietnam is THE MOST delicious blonde ale you're likely to find in town. Stop reading and go! It's fantastic!

Visited again today, the menu has changed though the quality hasn't!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Your words are like music to our brewing ears! Thank you for the wonderful praise and declaring our Good Morning Vietnam as the town's most delicious blonde ale. We're honored to be among your favorites. Can't wait to welcome you back for more fantastic times. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: What an awesome place. We had our grandsons birthday party in the coffee shop area last night and everything was wonderful. The entire place is beautiful and so lively. They are so much more than just a brewery. The beer and food is fabulous and great menus. Morgan took such wonderful care of us. She is amazing. Everyone working seems so happy and seemed to enjoy being there. We will definitely be back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for celebrating your grandson’s birthday with us! We’re honored to have been part of such a special day and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed the space, the food, and the beer. Morgan will be so happy to hear your kind words—we’re lucky to have her! We truly appreciate your support and can’t wait to welcome you back soon. Cheers to more memorable moments!

reviews_data.review_text: Sure, their beer is better than most breweries in Charlotte, but the real kicker is their coffee and breakfast sandwiches. Love that this place is walking distance from my condo. Dog friendly too (if you have a service animal)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear you're enjoying both the beer and the coffee—and we're especially proud of those breakfast sandwiches too. Being a neighborhood spot for Coffee Bar, Kitchen, and taproom means everything to us, so we're glad to be just a short stroll away. Hope to serve you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Was in town for Panthers football game and wanted to check out a few places in Uptown. Rode scooters and saw this cool place . Bartenders were extremely friendly and quick . Drinks were nice and strong! Service was definitely A+ . The food was ok.. we ordered wings and crab cakes .. the crab cakes were very tasty, however the wings were very plain , and the sauce was on the side which was hard to eat because it wasn't mixed w the wings .. other than that not a very mixed crowd, but didn't feel awkward at all . It is more for a college crowd if I had to describe the atmosphere.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for stopping by while you were in town for the game — sounds like you made the most of your Uptown adventure! We're thrilled to hear our bartenders helped make your visit memorable with great service and strong pours.  We appreciate the feedback on the food —we're always looking to improve! Hope we get to see you again next time you're in Charlotte! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
Been to Charlotte many times, first trip here. Only for breakfast and coffee so can’t speak for the beer at all, although I imagine, with the attention to detail on the food and coffee the beer is probably good also.

But now to the impression part, what we got to eat.  My wife got the bacon, egg and cheese biscuit which we’d agree was a solid 8.5. Delicious, but maybe could have used some sauce if we are critiquing.

I ordered the fried chicken sandwich on the dukes potato roll (I added egg and cheese which I feel like could be crucial to my review). This was HANDS DOWN one of the best breakfast sandwiches I’ve ever had! The salty/sweet combo, accompanied with the perfectly crispy fried chicken is beyond deliciousness. Go eat this sandwich, unless you don’t like delicious food, you won’t be disappointed.

Sorry no photos. Food was gone before I even considered that lol.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Wow—thank you so much for this incredible review! We're thrilled your first visit made such a memorable impression. We're especially honored to hear that our fried chicken sandwich ranks among your all-time favorites (the egg and cheese addition is a pro move). 

We appreciate your thoughtful feedback on the biscuit sandwich, too—always looking for ways to improve, and you've got us thinking about some sauce ideas.

Hope to see you both again soon—maybe for round two and to try the beer next time! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: This was a fun stop on our date night, I enjoyed the gf cider, Bludacris. It wasn’t too sweet for a cider, I highly recommend it.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for choosing Wooden Robot for your date night! We're happy to hear you enjoyed the spot and the delicious cider from Bull City Ciderworks. For your next visit, we do use an enzyme in most of our beers that significantly reduces gluten content, so our beers are considered “gluten-reduced”, which is a plus for many GF drinkers. Thanks again for your review!

reviews_data.review_text: A popular spot, nice patio and interior. There are lots of breweries in Southend, this one is just closest to the rail so a good place to meet up easily without going into LoSo.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Kaitlyn, thank you for the review and stopping by. We’re so glad to hear you enjoyed your visit, the patio, and the South End location. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Perfect spot to chill on the patio and have a flight in the sun! Lots of beer options to try so something to please everybody. The branding and merch design is done really well, and the sew-on patches available for purchase are a nice touch. Really appreciated them being open on a Monday as that isn’t always a given with breweries!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review! We're so glad you enjoyed soaking up the sun on the patio with a flight (or two). We put a lot of love into our beer and branding, so it's great to hear that it stood out — and shoutout to you for noticing the patches! Hope to see you again soon (maybe even on another Monday on our Coffee Bar side). Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee and and brewery. The staff is knowledgeable and friendly. The seasonal s’mores coffee was great.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for checking out our Coffee Bar and for leaving a review! Our team will be so happy to hear your kind words. Glad to hear the S'mores Latte was good too—we hope you'll stop in again to try our new seasonal offerings! Cheers.

reviews_data.review_text: Food is great (fried chicken sandwich and fries). Beer is amazing and always rotating (try the Good Morning Vietnam) and the atmosphere/space is top notch. One of the best breweries in CLT in my opinion.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the review, Bryan! We're glad you enjoyed the fried chicken sandwich and some Good Morning Vietnam—always a fan favorite! Appreciate the kind words and hope to see you back soon for more great beer and good vibes!

reviews_data.review_text: I go here only for the coffee. SOLID. Best baristas in the Charlotte metro area. I always try to come during slow hours so I can find parking and not have to wait a long time for my drink. Oh, the breakfast sammies are yummy too.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the SOLID review! We appreciate the 5-star review for our Coffee Bar, baristas, and breakfast items from our Kitchen! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Signature Chicken Sandwich and a Good Morning Vieatnam beer.

Best Fried Chicken Sandwich I've ever had. I've ordered it probably 20 times.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Robert, thank you for this amazing review and recommendation! Thanks for visiting us often and for ordering our Fried Chicken Sandwich. We might be a little biased, but we think it's pretty good, too! We hope you'll come by for another beer and sandwich soon.

reviews_data.review_text: REALLY good coffee and vibes
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting our Coffee Bar and sharing a review! We hope to serve you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Pros… nice seating area.

Cons… only like 4 drinks on the tap and hardly anything on the drink menu. They don’t have a full bar so there are only like 2 or 3 options worth your time. Took about 15 min in line and the barista didn’t know the menu. He pointed to a messy chalk board with writing you can barely read and told us that was it

There are at least 4 places within walking distance that top this. Never going back

Came in from out of town on a trivia night (Tuesday)

Was a full house, great vibes

Food was very good, chicken sandwhich was incredible, wings were fine, fries top notch

Beer was Ok, served in appropriate glassware which I love, flavors were on point to brand they all just felt a tad light in body is my only complaint.

Parking stinks as I’m sure others mentioned

Def a cool spot and I’d go back just for the chicken
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for choosing Wooden Robot when you were in town! We appreciate you stopping in on Trivia night and for leaving a great review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our Fried Chicken Sandwich! We hope you do pop by the next time you are in Charlotte.

reviews_data.review_text: I loved the cinnamon roll beer, was so smooth. Very cool place, would definitely come back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping in and leaving an awesome review! We appreciate all the photos you shared and we are glad to hear you enjoyed our seasonal Cinnamon Roll Good Morning Vietnam. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Service was awesome....guy behind the bar was super helpful and enthusiastic. The house made pretzel.....was sooooooo good! I was already full but stuffed myself. I'm all about a fresh pretzel and it's very hard to find. The beer cheese was also very yummy. My husband had the German sausage plate...he loves it! Fresh from Germany!. Daughter likes the burger and son-in-law and grand daughter enjoyed the chicken wings. Beer was good. Ambiance was very bar like and a good game time atmosphere on Sunday football
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your kind words and for leaving a review! We hope to see you again soon to try more of our rotating food menu! Cheers.

reviews_data.review_text: chicken breakfast sandwich… only chicken and bread. everything else is additional including sauce. kinda weak.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We’re sad to hear that the chicken breakfast sandwich didn’t meet your expectations. We aim to provide a customizable experience and menu for all, so we hope you'll give us another try soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is so cool! Just had a simple caramel latte and it’s the best one I’ve ever had! We had my friend’s dog with us. There were several other dogs there and it was peaceful. I didn’t get a chance to try their fall-themed drinks but they sounded amazing! I’ll have to stop by next time I’m in town!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the fantastic review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your visit and your Caramel Latte. We do hope to see you again the next time you are in Charlotte.

reviews_data.review_text: Great spot with good beer and food and helpful, friendly service
reviews_data.owner_answer: Kira, thank you for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed the beer, food, and our friendly service. We hope to see you again soon for another great visit!

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped by super quick after coming from an event next door. Very open layout with plenty of seating both indoors and outdoors. From what I could tell, this place is dog friendly, and there were a lot of cute doggies around. First time at this location. Parking is chaotic. It's in Sound End. They do have a little parking lot across the street, but if it's full, there is street parking if you are able yo snag one.  Employees were super friendly. The bartender was quick and efficient. Bathrooms were clean as well. I can see this place getting pretty busy on nights and weekends. I didn't see any games around at this location unless I missed them. I do know they serve coffee at this location. They have food also, but I didn't try any.  Wouldn't mind stopping by again if I'm ever in the area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for stopping by and sharing your detailed feedback! We're thrilled you enjoyed the open layout, friendly atmosphere, and efficient service at our location. Our staff works hard to provide a 5-star experience for all, so honestly, we’re a bit disappointed to see a 3-star rating. We understand that parking can be a challenge in South End when our lot fills up, and we appreciate your patience. We hope you'll stop by Wooden Robot again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: I'm not really a drinker, so I honestly can't speak to the beer, but I can tell you that everyone I know loves to go here and the atmosphere is really nice. It's a cool place to hangout and have great conversations with friends. Very popular place as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! We're glad you enjoy the atmosphere and find it a great spot to hang out with friends. Even if you're not into beer, we love knowing that our space brings people together for good times and great conversations. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing place! Came by here on a random Tuesday night, the place was packed for a pub-quiz but luckily still had space for us outside, and we loved the cider and the atmosphere! Also, the merch is really cute :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Gineke! Sounds like you visited us on our Tuesday Trivia night in South End. We're happy to hear you had a good time and we hope you’ll stop by again some time. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Mexican lager was nice and refreshing on a hot day!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review Courtney! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our Robotico beer. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: My girlfriend and I love this place. Great beers and great vibes. Highly recommend!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your amazing review! We hope to see you again soon for a cheers and a 5-star rating!

reviews_data.review_text: Very nice brewery, fun staff, and great beer!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Nice stop before a show. Train line a few feet away.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us. We are glad you enjoyed your experience. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Disappointing beer. Sours taste like vinegar. Good morning Vietnam was a good brew. IPAs are okay and everything else is just below average. Environment is great, but do not come here if you are looking for unique or above average craft beer.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're sorry to hear that some of our beers didn’t meet your expectations, but we appreciate you mentioning Good Morning Vietnam and the positive environment. reviews_data.review_text:
Seems like a cool place and the beer I had was tasty. My wife really enjoyed the cider she tried as well. However when we initially walked up the menu board only had maybe 15 items on it and almost half of them were marked as sold out. So the selection felt really limited which was very disappointing.

The atmosphere was good, they were just spinning up a trivia night as we left so people were there having a good time and I could definitely see this being a good regular hangout location

Would love to try them again when they have a better handle on their draft list.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for coming out and for your feedback.We're glad to hear that you liked the atmosphere—it’s always great to hear that our space feels like a fun hangout spot. As a small local brewery, we sometimes sell out faster than expected, but we’re constantly working to keep the selection full and fresh. We’d love to welcome you back soon when we have even more on tap for you to enjoy!

reviews_data.review_text: Best beer ever and the nicest people ever too
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the support and for leaving a review! Our staff works hard to keep up with all our thirsty guests, so we appreciate your kind words.

reviews_data.review_text: Delicious beers and great atmosphere and always great service. It can get very crowded so be aware. I've never had a bad experience here
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by our taproom, Sam! Our team works hard to keep up with all our thirsty guests even when there is a crowd, so we appreciate your 5-star recommendation and review. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Very cool brewery with plenty of outdoor seating, lots of beer options, and friendly staff!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your amazing review! Looking forward to seeing you again soon. Cheers.

reviews_data.review_text: Good service, good beer.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate you coming out and showing your support. We hope to make your next visit even better!

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped by here based solely on the fact that it was a Saturday at 9:00am and they offered coffee, beer, and breakfast. They nailed it on all three options! I had the Red Eye with the in-house made cinnamon and brown sugar syrup (amazing) and a red sour beer (also amazing if you like sours). For breakfast I had a sausage egg and cheese sandwich, and a chorizo and egg empanada, both of which were perfect. I followed it up with their delicious stout (which I added an espresso shot to after tasting, it’s the breakfast of champions). Staff was friendly, funny, and awesome.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting our taproom and Coffee Bar location in the South End neighborhood! Our team works hard to provide a fun and friendly atmosphere with something for everyone to enjoy. We may have provided the offerings, but you created the best Breakfast of Champions we've heard in a long time! We're so happy you enjoyed your beer, coffee, and food at Wooden Robot! We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your amazing review.

reviews_data.review_text: Good beer and great burgers
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your 5-star review! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: The beer and food are great, but a lot of breweries in Charlotte have great beer and food.  The thing that makes Wooden Robot so nice is how genuinely friendly the staff is.  The bartenders always seems so happy to be there, and happy to be serving you.  Never pushy, never impatient, always helpful.  It's a great place to spend some time.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Justin, thank you for visiting Wooden Robot and leaving this review. Our team is very passionate and knowledgeable about all things beer, so it is our honor and joy to help you find a beer that you'll enjoy. We appreciate your recommendation and kind words to our staff. We hope you'll stop by again soon and try something new. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
Wooden Robot Brewery is a sanctuary for beer aficionados and coffee connoisseurs alike, nestled in the heart of Charlotte, NC. Their diverse selection of craft brews tantalizes the taste buds with each sip, showcasing a blend of innovation and tradition that sets them apart. From crisp IPAs to rich stouts, their brews cater to every palate, inviting patrons on a flavorful journey through the art of brewing.

But it's not just about the beer; Wooden Robot also boasts a curated selection of craft coffees, perfect for those seeking a midday pick-me-up or a leisurely sip with friends. Each cup is meticulously brewed to perfection, delivering a robust and aromatic experience that elevates the senses.

Pair your beverage of choice with their delectable bar food offerings, ranging from classic pub fare to inventive small plates. Whether you're craving a juicy burger or artisanal charcuterie, their menu satisfies every craving, leaving you fully satisfied and craving more.

However, what truly sets Wooden Robot apart is its exceptional team of employees. Friendly, knowledgeable, and passionate about their craft, they embody the spirit of hospitality, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere for all who walk through the door. Their genuine enthusiasm for the brewery's offerings and dedication to providing top-notch service ensure that every visit is memorable.

In sum, Wooden Robot Brewery isn't just a place to grab a drink or a bite to eat—it's an embodiment of Charlotte's vibrant and eclectic culture. Through its outstanding brews, craft coffee, delicious food, and exceptional staff, it offers a glimpse into the soul of the city, where creativity, community, and good times come together in perfect harmony.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Wow! Thank you so much for this incredible review! We’re truly humbled by your thoughtful and detailed words. It means the world to us that you’ve captured the essence of what we aim to provide here at Wooden Robot Brewery—a place where creativity, community, and craft come together in harmony.

From our beers to our coffee, and of course, the food, we strive to create experiences that cater to every guest who walks through our doors, and your recognition of that really affirms why we do what we do. We're especially grateful for your kind words about our team—our staff takes great pride in delivering excellent service, and your appreciation will definitely be shared with them.

We’re thrilled that you’ve found a special spot with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for more flavorful journeys and memorable moments! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
I’m a visitor from CT and I love this place!
Since I had to be gluten free, I can enjoy beer again!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Dina, thank you for the 5-star review and for sharing a little bit about our beer. Our beers are considered “gluten-reduced” since we use an enzyme in most of our beers that significantly reduces gluten content. We’re so glad to hear you enjoyed your visit from CT! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great beer tenders, knowledgeable and friendly.  Diverse selection of beers, all done very well.  Deepest condolences to Dan's family, friends, and the CLT beer community. Speaking as a beer industry worker visiting from out of town, please support these folks.  They do a great job.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting us. We appreciate your kind words and recommendation to the CLT beer community. We hope to see you again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Welcoming atmosphere for any craft beer enthusiast. Enjoy a beer inside or outside. Watch sporting events or enjoy a game of bags or pinball. Even when they are busy, the staff works diligently to serve you with friendliness and passion
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Amanda! We are happy to hear that you've enjoyed your visit and all of our offerings. It is our pleasure to serve our thirsty guests and we love talking about beer and all our offerings. We hope you can visit again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Need a 4.75 star rating. Came here to hang out for a bit. Had the pretzels and a flight. The neer cheese and pretzels are legit. All the beers were good, not great. Really enjoyed Good Morning Vietnam, my favorite of the 5 I had in the flight. Cool vibe and great place to just relax.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! We hope to see you again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Great atmosphere, great service, great beer, Best Damn Cheeseburger I’ve EVER HAD!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the fantastic review! We're delighted to hear you enjoyed the atmosphere, service, and our beer. And wow, we're thrilled that our cheeseburger made such an impression! We can't wait to welcome you back for more great experiences. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Hands down, best Fried Chicken Sandwich in Charlotte!!!!! Axios, get on this….
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, hands down one of our favorite reviews! Thanks for visiting us, Pedro, and ordering our Fried Chicken Sandwich. We might be a little biased, but we think it's one of the best in Charlotte, too! We hope you'll come by for another sandwich soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Love,love, love awesome spot. The coffee side is super chill where the other side was loud and crowded. Grade prices in the tasting glasses are super cute. Definitely recommend.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting our South End Wooden Robot location, Avery. We're happy to hear you were able to stop in both sides of our brewery: the main taproom and our Coffee Bar. We appreciate the review and recommendation.

reviews_data.review_text: I got the prickle my fancy which is a prickly pear sour and it was very good my husband got the dancing robot which is a 7% ABV IPA, it smells amazing and the flavor is really good for people who like IPAs. There is a really nice atmosphere and we enjoyed being able to see some of the work being done in the brewery. It's a raining Friday around lunch time and it is not too busy. Very nice place
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us. Thank you for the support and for leaving a review! Our brew staff and bartenders all work hard to offer something new and delicious to our thirsty guests, so we appreciate your kind words.

reviews_data.review_text: Best brewery in Charlotte
reviews_data.owner_answer: Brett, we appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your amazing review! It means the world to us that Wooden Robot tops your list for best brewery in Charlotte. Looking forward to seeing you again soon. Cheers.

reviews_data.review_text: Great little brewery. Food, beer, service, and vibe were excellent! Will definitely be back some day!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for stopping by and for leaving an wonderful review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and found something delicious to try. We can't wait for you to come back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Our favorite craft beer tap room in Charlotte.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Robert, thank you for visiting and the amazing review! We are honored to be on your list for favorite craft beer taproom in Charlotte. We're looking forward to raising a glass with you again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
Everyone who worked today (2/7/24) from like 3:55-4:10 was literally an angel and should get a raise. I love wooden robot but their team today took customer service to a whole new level. I want to kiss every one of them on the forehead. They could not have been nicer to me and my dog.

Wooden Robot knows how to grow well. Been coming here since 2019 when they were just a brewery. Their coffee shop is excellent and their food is a really well-planned menu that makes a strong addition to their offerings. I love that they have gf options since their beer is technically gf (less than 15 ppm- celiac delight!). This place just does a good job at everything. Yeah they get crowded, but it’s for a reason.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the incredibly kind words! We're thrilled to hear that our team made your visit so special. We strive to provide top-notch service and it's wonderful to know we exceeded your expectations. We're also glad you're enjoying our coffee shop, food menu, and gluten-free options. Tana, your continued support since 2019 means the world to us. We look forward to welcoming you and your dog back soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Great vibe, great bartenders, merch is on point, beer was fantastic (mocha coffee vanilla something)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the awesome review. We appreciate the kind words towards our space, our team, and our beer! Good Morning Vietnam Coffee Vanilla Blonde Ale is a fan favorite. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great location, nice outdoor area. A delicious Pops Pilsner. Their non-alcoholic options are tasty too. The pretzels came with a great coarse mustard and the hummus was different and sweet in a way that tickles the taste buds. I'll go here again!

reviews_data.review_text: Bartender was helpful with making a decision

We enjoyed some Smokey Parm
Wings too…flavour was great…we just wish they were a tad crispier!!
We will definitely return!

reviews_data.review_text: BUSSIN chicken sandwich. Thank you ❤️

reviews_data.review_text: Great spot with lots of indoor/outdoor seating. Coffee shop, expansive selection of craft beers, solid food menu. Friendly service. Large group seating and lots of TVs for sports.

reviews_data.review_text:
Y'all. This place is ah-maz-ing!!!!!

It's got such a fun, funky vibe. The music playing makes morning feel like a mood you can get behind. The coffee is crafted and incredible. It's absolutely an art. As an added bonus, if you love disc golf, Tyler behind the counter is a great conversation.

Beer for breakfast? No problem. This place has everything. All gluten free beer, and two craft ciders brewed in house. The seasonal selections are definitely in the DO NOT MISS category.

The brunch menu slaps. The owner's wife is a Celiac so we have options here!!

Come for the coffee, stay for vibe.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Phoebe, we're over the moon reading your awesome review! Thank you a latte for the love and for capturing the essence of our Coffee Bar. We're thrilled you  enjoy our vibe and our carefully crafted coffee - it's our morning artistry in a cup! 

It's fantastic to know that our gluten-reduced options resonate with you. We're here to provide a welcoming space for all to enjoy (coffee, beer, wine, food), and we can't wait for you to visit again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Real great location, great coffee, great beer and good food.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Jeff. We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your amazing review!

reviews_data.review_text: Nice spot, tasteful ambiance. Beer is good but not great, covenient that they have a proper espresso bar on site that looked good, but I didn't get to try it. Service isn't warm but they're also not rude and they get the job done. I would come back again.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We're pleased to hear you enjoyed our tasteful ambiance and found our on-site Coffee Bar appealing. We appreciate your feedback on the beer and service. We're always looking for ways to improve, and your insights are valuable. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Met some coworkers for a birthday lunch. I’m not a huge beer drinker, but they do have wine options available which was absolutely wonderful! I know, why go to a brewery if you aren’t drinking any brews? However, the Chardonnay was perfect and complimented my Chicken Caesar wrap and sweet potato fries nicely. You do have to go to the bar to get your drinks, as well as, order food. You will be given a table top number so that the server can find you with your order. This location is tucked away and has an open patio as well as indoor seating. Pups are welcome, so feel free to bring your fur babies because they are welcome, too!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you for celebrating a birthday lunch with us! We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit, even if you're not a big beer drinker. Our goal is to provide a welcoming space for all, so we're happy to offer more than just beer with wine, seltzers, ciders, coffee, and NA options. 

We appreciate you sharing your experience with the ordering process and the ambiance. It's wonderful to know you felt comfortable both indoors and on our open patio. Your feedback means a lot, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for more delightful moments and perhaps another round of wine that complements your meal beautifully. Cheers to good times and good company!

reviews_data.review_text: Great atmosphere & space. Very nice range of styles & solid brews. Super friendly service & tasty food options as well. Definitely recommend!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks a bunch for the glowing review! We're thrilled you enjoyed the atmosphere, brews, and bites. Looking forward to welcoming you back for more good times at Wooden Robot. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Nice brewery with a varied selection, including N/A, and good food
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Rob. We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your 5-star review! We aim to provide a space for all, so enjoy offering more than just beer, with non alcoholic options and good food. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Great brewery.  Love the low key vibe!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Jonathan! We (highkey) love your vibe and appreciate the 5-star review!

reviews_data.review_text: Joe was fantastic!! Very knowledgeable and friendly! Great beer, great people, great fun!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a great review, Rusty. We agree, Joe is a rockstar! We appreciate the kind words and support towards our staff. We can't wait to serve you again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Cool spot with a hipster vibe. Iced chai tea with oatmilk is honey is fabulous.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting our Coffee Bar in our OG Taproom! We appreciate the positive review and can't wait to whip you up another chai tea soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Ryan and the rest of the staff were awesome.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Brian! We appreciate your kind words and review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Excellent. A lot of times you hit a small brewery and the beer is kind of taste the same. Not so with Wooden Robot.

I lean into IPAs. Everyone was different. Everyone was on point. From a California East Coast mixture through their NEIPA all unique, all very tasty.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks a hop-ton for the awesome review! We're thrilled to hear you found our IPA lineup uniquely tasty. Crafting distinct brews is what we're all about, and we're delighted that you enjoyed the variety. Cheers to diverse flavors and great times at Wooden Robot.

reviews_data.review_text: Great food and beer.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your experience.

reviews_data.review_text: If you are coming to Charlotte and you Google “best breweries in town” , this is the spot you’re looking for!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, what a shoutout! Thanks a million for the love and recommendation, Jack. Can't wait to raise a glass with you again soon! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Exceptional coffee surpasses Starbucks!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by and trying out our new Coffee Bar! We appreciate your kind words and review!

reviews_data.review_text: Sold location and venue but after trying a flight of 5 separate beers they all basically tasted the same. Lacking variety.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly appreciate your visit and value your feedback. We're sorry to hear that the beer flight didn't meet your expectations. At Wooden Robot, we're committed to rotating our beer selections, aiming to provide a diverse range of flavors, and our staff is always ready to assist in guiding you to a selection of beers to meet your taste. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Wooden Robot is a decent brewery in NoDa, Charlotte with an extensive collection of beers and ciders. We visited on a Tuesday evening and it was understandably not busy.

We got the Space Magic IPA and the hard seltzer. Space Magic tasted much akin to a smooth, hazy IPA, and the seltzer was nice as well. The taco food truck outside complemented the drinks well.

They’ve seating both outside and inside as well as a rooftop. It’s located right next to the train station. The server was polite and we made small talk with her for a bit. Parking nearby can be a challenge—the garage right next to the brewery is free for the first 30 mins.

Overall, it’s a decent brewery in NoDa to have a fun time.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you for your thoughtful review and for visiting our second location, The Chamber, in NoDa! We're glad you enjoyed the drinks and the delightful taco pairing from one of our rotating food trucks. It's wonderful to hear that you appreciated our varied seating options and rooftop too.

We agree, parking in NoDa can be difficult, but the pro move to getting to NoDa is taking the CATS Blue Line light rail to the 36th Street stop! That brings you right to our doors. We hope to welcome you back for more fun times at The Chamber by Wooden Robot. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
This Wooden Robot, like The Chamber location, is hit or miss. Either their beers are on point and have a flavor - or they don't. And then they don't, they don't.
Music is generally obnoxiously blasting and hard to sit down and have a conversation with the folks you're with.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your honest feedback. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We're sorry to hear that our beers and the ambiance didn't consistently meet your expectations. We take this input seriously and will use it to improve. We hope you'll give us another chance to provide an exceptional experience that we strive for. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: I’ve only visited for the coffee bar during the week and weekend. The staff are amazing with my dogs and the drinks are great. I have a custom cappuccino request and they remember it! 💯
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by and trying out our new Coffee Bar! We appreciate your kind words and review! We can't wait to make your special cappuccino again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I’m not from Charlotte and live about 3000 miles away.  One week on, I’m still thinking about the awesome fried chicken sandwich. It was distinctive, cooked perfectly and came in an excellent delicious bun.  The garnish, while simple and straightforward, did not complicate the taste of the sandwich.  Any more would have ruined the balance. I was  trying to think of a better chicken sandwich I might have had before but couldn’t think of one.  Their beer is great too.  My wife prefers hard seltzer to beer.  Hers was the best I’ve ever tried.  Bartender was friendly and cool.  And I love dogs, of which there were many hanging out.  This place is awesome and should be frequented regularly by those lucky enough to live close by.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, Jesse! Your review just made our day, and our Kitchen team is doing a little happy dance over here. We're thrilled to hear that our fried chicken sandwich left a lasting impression for you, and we're blushing over your kind words. We're all about that balance, so we're delighted it hit the spot for you. We're honored you took the time to share your experience, especially considering you're 3000 miles away! Next time you're in Charlotte, we'll have another awesome sandwich (or two) and a cold beverage waiting for you. Cheers to tasty memories and safe travels!

reviews_data.review_text: Come here when I venture down to Charlotte.. Great beer and the Fried Chicken sandwich cannot be topped... Dog friendly too!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for venturing down to Charlotte, and into Wooden Robot! We appreciate the amazing review, and (while we are biased) we agree our Kitchen makes a mean Fried Chicken Sandwich! We hope to see you again soon, Craig!

reviews_data.review_text: Blown away. Great on all the styles. Czech pilsner was perfect for the style. Solid IPAs but their farmhouse beers have a great depth of flavor and are amazing.. Great staff and great atmosphere. They know their stuff.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for stopping by and for leaving such an amazing review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and found something delicious to try. Our staff is passionate about good beer, and love sharing it with our guests. Barry, we can't wait for you to come back again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Decent beer, bartender was great. Used to New England IPAs so these hazy's were different, not bad but different
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by. We really appreciate your review, and we hope to have a few more beers on tap that better fit your style the next time you visit.

reviews_data.review_text: I really loved their beers on tap. Enjoyed a flight and also had the Wing Wednesdays which is a pretty good deal (8 wings with celery and half fries for $10).
reviews_data.owner_answer: Anindita, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us by trying a few different beers, plus our Wing Wednesday special! We appreciate your kind words and for leaving a review. We hope to see you again soon to check out some other offerings we have!

reviews_data.review_text:
Tasty beers. Laid back vibe. Lovely Staff. Nice selection of Sours. Pet friendly patio.

I seldom drink beer anymore because of the way it makes me feel afterwards (bloated, headache, achy joints, etc.).

However, Wooden Robot is the exception. I have never had any adverse effects after drinking their beer. It is my #1 choice when hanging out in CLT for a pub crawl with friends.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your fantastic experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoy our beers, vibe, and staff. We're honored to be your #1 choice for hangs with your friends in Charlotte. Looking forward to serving you more delightful brews on your next visit. Cheers to good times and great company!

reviews_data.review_text: Lindsey and Brett are the main reasons I come to Wooden. Excellent customer service and make us feel like home. I’ve been the to so many breweries and this one is the hands down the best. The best beer in town as well!

reviews_data.review_text: Went today around 1115 and only the coffee shop side was open at that time.  Sat at the bar for a flight and a pretzel. Service was terrible!! I was never greeted and had to as the bar tender for assistance to get a flight and later to get my check.  She was terribly inattentive! Hopefully the brewery side is better.  Had a flight and a pretzel.  I really enjoyed the Brain Drizzle IPA and the pretzel was on point - soft and buttery. I wasn't a fan of the mustard or cheese. The cheese was very peppery tasting.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thanks so much for stopping by and taking the time to share your experience with us. We’re glad to hear you enjoyed the Brain Drizzle IPA and that the pretzel hit the mark — soft and buttery is exactly what we’re going for! 

That said, we’re really sorry to hear the service didn’t meet expectations. We always aim to provide a warm, attentive experience, and it sounds like we missed the mark during your visit. We appreciate your feedback and will address this with our team to make sure we're doing better moving forward.

We’d love for you to visit the main brewery side sometime soon — different vibe, same great beer! Hopefully we can turn things around on your next visit. Cheers!

Truth be told he comped me an extra because he said he liked me. That is true customer service right there, and that beer was my favorite, took one to go AND bought and awesome button down shirt for my hubby. Long story short , My experience with both locations was positive and for those that may have been apart of my experience will be happy to know that the 2X shirt ended up fitting!!! (My husband wears an xl , be sure to check the fit out before just buying your normal size-)
Thanks to the guy with the black hat and the guy checking in the back 👍👍

reviews_data.review_text: Grace and company were so nice. I'm glad we got to experience this place. Awesome drinks and great vibes. My wife and I will definitely be back.

Wooden Robot was a really fun and quirky brewery, with great IPAs and an awesome outdoor setup. I loved the artwork that adorned the walls of the establishment, which even included a great piece of art in the restroom! Like I said, my IPA was great, and was just one of the many that the brewery had on the menu.

Overall, Wooden Robot was an awesome brewery, and I'd love to come back in the future to try some more of their brews!
Nice beers and good place

This place is incredible for Celiacs like me! My fiancé and walked in here during our vacation not knowing that almost ALL of the beers are gluten reduced - what an amazing surprise that was for me! I was able to try so many styles of beer (most for the first time ever) and had absolutely no gut issues or reactions afterwards.

For those who don't care about the gluten - my fiancé said there's no way he could tell the beers were gluten reduced, and he would definitely order them again if he saw them on the menu. 10/10, would recommend to anyone with gluten intolerance or Celiacs. I recommended the sours, especially True Survivor!

Wooden Robot is probably my favorite brewery in Charlotte for quite a long time; only second to Catawba Brewing which closed a couple of years ago. Good coffee in the mornings and great beer from the source taproom and all over Charlotte.
Good beer but expensive. Chill atmosphere.

reviews_data.review_text:
Wooden Robot Brewery is a gem in the heart of the city, offering an exceptional selection of craft beers that cater to both seasoned aficionados and newcomers alike. From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere, complete with rustic wooden accents and a lively vibe that makes it an ideal spot for socializing or unwinding after a long day.

One standout beer is their "Ghost in the Machine," a New England IPA that boasts a hazy appearance and a burst of tropical fruit aromas. Each sip delivers a delightful balance of juicy hops and a smooth mouthfeel, making it dangerously drinkable. The citrus and stone fruit flavors linger pleasantly, leaving you eager for another round.

The brewery also offers a rotating lineup of seasonal brews, including stouts, sours, and lagers, ensuring that there’s always something new to try. The knowledgeable staff are more than happy to guide you through their offerings and recommend food pairings from their onsite food trucks, which complement the beer perfectly.

In addition to the outstanding beer, Wooden Robot Brewery frequently hosts fun events, from trivia nights to live music, creating a sense of community that keeps patrons coming back. Whether you're stopping in for a quick pint or planning a leisurely afternoon with friends, Wooden Robot Brewery is a must-visit destination for anyone looking to experience top-notch craft beer in a friendly and welcoming environment.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you so much for the kind and thoughtful review! We’re honored to be called a “gem” and truly appreciate you taking the time to share such detailed feedback. It means a lot to hear that you enjoyed the atmosphere, our ever-changing lineup of beers.

We’re passionate about creating a welcoming space where folks can enjoy great beer, good food, and memorable moments together, and we’re so glad that came through in your visit. We hope to see you again soon for another round (or two)! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Was in town for Panthers football game and wanted to check out a few places in Uptown. Rode scooters and saw this cool place . Bartenders were extremely friendly and quick . Hope we get to see you again next time you're in Charlotte! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
Been to Charlotte many times, first trip here. Only for breakfast and coffee so can’t speak for the beer at all, although I imagine, with the attention to detail on the food and coffee the beer is probably good also.

But now to the impression part, what we got to eat.  My wife got the bacon, egg and cheese biscuit which we’d agree was a solid 8.5. Delicious, but maybe could have used some sauce if we are critiquing.

I ordered the fried chicken sandwich on the dukes potato roll (I added egg and cheese which I feel like could be crucial to my review). This was HANDS DOWN one of the best breakfast sandwiches I’ve ever had! The salty/sweet combo, accompanied with the perfectly crispy fried chicken is beyond deliciousness. Go eat this sandwich, unless you don’t like delicious food, you won’t be disappointed.

Sorry no photos. Food was gone before I even considered that lol.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Wow—thank you so much for this incredible review! We're thrilled your first visit made such a memorable impression. We're especially honored to hear that our fried chicken sandwich ranks among your all-time favorites (the egg and cheese addition is a pro move). 

We appreciate your thoughtful feedback on the biscuit sandwich, too—always looking for ways to improve, and you've got us thinking about some sauce ideas.

Hope to see you both again soon—maybe for round two and to try the beer next time! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped by super quick after coming from an event next door. Very open layout with plenty of seating both indoors and outdoors. From what I could tell, this place is dog friendly, and there were a lot of cute doggies around. First time at this location. Parking is chaotic. It's in Sound End. They do have a little parking lot across the street, but if it's full, there is street parking if you are able yo snag one.  Employees were super friendly. The bartender was quick and efficient. Bathrooms were clean as well. I can see this place getting pretty busy on nights and weekends. I didn't see any games around at this location unless I missed them. I do know they serve coffee at this location. They have food also, but I didn't try any.  Wouldn't mind stopping by again if I'm ever in the area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for stopping by and sharing your detailed feedback! We're thrilled you enjoyed the open layout, friendly atmosphere, and efficient service at our location. Our staff works hard to provide a 5-star experience for all, so honestly, we’re a bit disappointed to see a 3-star rating. We understand that parking can be a challenge in South End when our lot fills up, and we appreciate your patience. We hope you'll stop by Wooden Robot again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: I'm not really a drinker, so I honestly can't speak to the beer, but I can tell you that everyone I know loves to go here and the atmosphere is really nice. It's a cool place to hangout and have great conversations with friends. Very popular place as well.

However when we initially walked up the menu board only had maybe 15 items on it and almost half of them were marked as sold out. So the selection felt really limited which was very disappointing.

The atmosphere was good, they were just spinning up a trivia night as we left so people were there having a good time and I could definitely see this being a good regular hangout location

Would love to try them again when they have a better handle on their draft list.

reviews_data.review_text: Best beer ever and the nicest people ever too

reviews_data.review_text: Delicious beers and great atmosphere and always great service. It can get very crowded so be aware. I've never had a bad experience here
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by our taproom, Sam! Our team works hard to keep up with all our thirsty guests even when there is a crowd, so we appreciate your 5-star recommendation and review. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Very cool brewery with plenty of outdoor seating, lots of beer options, and friendly staff!

reviews_data.review_text: Good service, good beer.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate you coming out and showing your support. We hope to make your next visit even better!

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped by here based solely on the fact that it was a Saturday at 9:00am and they offered coffee, beer, and breakfast. They nailed it on all three options! I had the Red Eye with the in-house made cinnamon and brown sugar syrup (amazing) and a red sour beer (also amazing if you like sours). For breakfast I had a sausage egg and cheese sandwich, and a chorizo and egg empanada, both of which were perfect. I followed it up with their delicious stout (which I added an espresso shot to after tasting, it’s the breakfast of champions). Staff was friendly, funny, and awesome.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting our taproom and Coffee Bar location in the South End neighborhood! Our team works hard to provide a fun and friendly atmosphere with something for everyone to enjoy. We may have provided the offerings, but you created the best Breakfast of Champions we've heard in a long time! We're so happy you enjoyed your beer, coffee, and food at Wooden Robot! We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your amazing review.

reviews_data.review_text: Good beer and great burgers

reviews_data.review_text: The beer and food are great, but a lot of breweries in Charlotte have great beer and food.  The thing that makes Wooden Robot so nice is how genuinely friendly the staff is.  The bartenders always seems so happy to be there, and happy to be serving you.  Never pushy, never impatient, always helpful.  It's a great place to spend some time.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Justin, thank you for visiting Wooden Robot and leaving this review. Our team is very passionate and knowledgeable about all things beer, so it is our honor and joy to help you find a beer that you'll enjoy. We appreciate your recommendation and kind words to our staff. We hope you'll stop by again soon and try something new. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
Wooden Robot Brewery is a sanctuary for beer aficionados and coffee connoisseurs alike, nestled in the heart of Charlotte, NC. Their diverse selection of craft brews tantalizes the taste buds with each sip, showcasing a blend of innovation and tradition that sets them apart. From crisp IPAs to rich stouts, their brews cater to every palate, inviting patrons on a flavorful journey through the art of brewing.

But it's not just about the beer; Wooden Robot also boasts a curated selection of craft coffees, perfect for those seeking a midday pick-me-up or a leisurely sip with friends. Each cup is meticulously brewed to perfection, delivering a robust and aromatic experience that elevates the senses.

Pair your beverage of choice with their delectable bar food offerings, ranging from classic pub fare to inventive small plates. Whether you're craving a juicy burger or artisanal charcuterie, their menu satisfies every craving, leaving you fully satisfied and craving more.

However, what truly sets Wooden Robot apart is its exceptional team of employees. Friendly, knowledgeable, and passionate about their craft, they embody the spirit of hospitality, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere for all who walk through the door. Their genuine enthusiasm for the brewery's offerings and dedication to providing top-notch service ensure that every visit is memorable.

In sum, Wooden Robot Brewery isn't just a place to grab a drink or a bite to eat—it's an embodiment of Charlotte's vibrant and eclectic culture. Through its outstanding brews, craft coffee, delicious food, and exceptional staff, it offers a glimpse into the soul of the city, where creativity, community, and good times come together in perfect harmony.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Wow! Thank you so much for this incredible review! We’re truly humbled by your thoughtful and detailed words. It means the world to us that you’ve captured the essence of what we aim to provide here at Wooden Robot Brewery—a place where creativity, community, and craft come together in harmony.

From our beers to our coffee, and of course, the food, we strive to create experiences that cater to every guest who walks through our doors, and your recognition of that really affirms why we do what we do. We're especially grateful for your kind words about our team—our staff takes great pride in delivering excellent service, and your appreciation will definitely be shared with them.

We’re thrilled that you’ve found a special spot with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for more flavorful journeys and memorable moments! Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
I’m a visitor from CT and I love this place!
Since I had to be gluten free, I can enjoy beer again!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Dina, thank you for the 5-star review and for sharing a little bit about our beer. Our beers are considered “gluten-reduced” since we use an enzyme in most of our beers that significantly reduces gluten content. We’re so glad to hear you enjoyed your visit from CT! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great beer tenders, knowledgeable and friendly.  Diverse selection of beers, all done very well.  Deepest condolences to Dan's family, friends, and the CLT beer community. Speaking as a beer industry worker visiting from out of town, please support these folks.  They do a great job.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting us. We appreciate your kind words and recommendation to the CLT beer community. We hope to see you again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Welcoming atmosphere for any craft beer enthusiast. Enjoy a beer inside or outside. Watch sporting events or enjoy a game of bags or pinball. Even when they are busy, the staff works diligently to serve you with friendliness and passion

reviews_data.review_text: Need a 4.75 star rating. Came here to hang out for a bit. Had the pretzels and a flight. The neer cheese and pretzels are legit. All the beers were good, not great. Really enjoyed Good Morning Vietnam, my favorite of the 5 I had in the flight. Cool vibe and great place to just relax.

reviews_data.review_text: Hands down, best Fried Chicken Sandwich in Charlotte!!!!! Axios, get on this….

reviews_data.review_text: Love,love, love awesome spot. The coffee side is super chill where the other side was loud and crowded. Grade prices in the tasting glasses are super cute. Definitely recommend.

reviews_data.review_text: I got the prickle my fancy which is a prickly pear sour and it was very good my husband got the dancing robot which is a 7% ABV IPA, it smells amazing and the flavor is really good for people who like IPAs. reviews_data.review_text:
Everyone who worked today (2/7/24) from like 3:55-4:10 was literally an angel and should get a raise. I love wooden robot but their team today took customer service to a whole new level. I want to kiss every one of them on the forehead. They could not have been nicer to me and my dog.

Wooden Robot knows how to grow well. Been coming here since 2019 when they were just a brewery. Their coffee shop is excellent and their food is a really well-planned menu that makes a strong addition to their offerings. I love that they have gf options since their beer is technically gf (less than 15 ppm- celiac delight!). This place just does a good job at everything. Yeah they get crowded, but it’s for a reason.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the incredibly kind words! We're thrilled to hear that our team made your visit so special. We strive to provide top-notch service and it's wonderful to know we exceeded your expectations. We're also glad you're enjoying our coffee shop, food menu, and gluten-free options. Tana, your continued support since 2019 means the world to us. We look forward to welcoming you and your dog back soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Great vibe, great bartenders, merch is on point, beer was fantastic (mocha coffee vanilla something)

Y'all. This place is ah-maz-ing!!!!!

It's got such a fun, funky vibe. The music playing makes morning feel like a mood you can get behind. The coffee is crafted and incredible. It's absolutely an art. As an added bonus, if you love disc golf, Tyler behind the counter is a great conversation.

Beer for breakfast? No problem. This place has everything. All gluten free beer, and two craft ciders brewed in house. The seasonal selections are definitely in the DO NOT MISS category.

The brunch menu slaps. The owner's wife is a Celiac so we have options here!!

Come for the coffee, stay for vibe.

Phoebe, we're over the moon reading your awesome review! Thank you a latte for the love and for capturing the essence of our Coffee Bar. We're thrilled you  enjoy our vibe and our carefully crafted coffee - it's our morning artistry in a cup!

reviews_data.review_text: Met some coworkers for a birthday lunch. I’m not a huge beer drinker, but they do have wine options available which was absolutely wonderful! You do have to go to the bar to get your drinks, as well as, order food. You will be given a table top number so that the server can find you with your order. This location is tucked away and has an open patio as well as indoor seating. Pups are welcome, so feel free to bring your fur babies because they are welcome, too!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you for celebrating a birthday lunch with us! We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your visit, even if you're not a big beer drinker. Our goal is to provide a welcoming space for all, so we're happy to offer more than just beer with wine, seltzers, ciders, coffee, and NA options. 

We appreciate you sharing your experience with the ordering process and the ambiance. It's wonderful to know you felt comfortable both indoors and on our open patio. Your feedback means a lot, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for more delightful moments and perhaps another round of wine that complements your meal beautifully. Cheers to good times and good company!

I lean into IPAs. Everyone was different. Everyone was on point. From a California East Coast mixture through their NEIPA all unique, all very tasty.

reviews_data.review_text: Great food and beer.

reviews_data.review_text: If you are coming to Charlotte and you Google “best breweries in town” , this is the spot you’re looking for!

reviews_data.review_text: Exceptional coffee surpasses Starbucks!
