reviews_data.review_text: Sold location and venue but after trying a flight of 5 separate beers they all basically tasted the same. Lacking variety.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly appreciate your visit and value your feedback. We're sorry to hear that the beer flight didn't meet your expectations. At Wooden Robot, we're committed to rotating our beer selections, aiming to provide a diverse range of flavors, and our staff is always ready to assist in guiding you to a selection of beers to meet your taste. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Wooden Robot is a decent brewery in NoDa, Charlotte with an extensive collection of beers and ciders. We visited on a Tuesday evening and it was understandably not busy.

We got the Space Magic IPA and the hard seltzer. Space Magic tasted much akin to a smooth, hazy IPA, and the seltzer was nice as well. The taco food truck outside complemented the drinks well.

They’ve seating both outside and inside as well as a rooftop. It’s located right next to the train station. The server was polite and we made small talk with her for a bit. Parking nearby can be a challenge—the garage right next to the brewery is free for the first 30 mins.

Overall, it’s a decent brewery in NoDa to have a fun time.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you for your thoughtful review and for visiting our second location, The Chamber, in NoDa! We're glad you enjoyed the drinks and the delightful taco pairing from one of our rotating food trucks. It's wonderful to hear that you appreciated our varied seating options and rooftop too.

We agree, parking in NoDa can be difficult, but the pro move to getting to NoDa is taking the CATS Blue Line light rail to the 36th Street stop! That brings you right to our doors. We hope to welcome you back for more fun times at The Chamber by Wooden Robot. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text:
This Wooden Robot, like The Chamber location, is hit or miss. Either their beers are on point and have a flavor - or they don't. And then they don't, they don't.
Music is generally obnoxiously blasting and hard to sit down and have a conversation with the folks you're with.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your honest feedback. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We're sorry to hear that our beers and the ambiance didn't consistently meet your expectations. We take this input seriously and will use it to improve. We hope you'll give us another chance to provide an exceptional experience that we strive for. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: I’ve only visited for the coffee bar during the week and weekend. The staff are amazing with my dogs and the drinks are great. I have a custom cappuccino request and they remember it! 💯
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by and trying out our new Coffee Bar! We appreciate your kind words and review! We can't wait to make your special cappuccino again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I’m not from Charlotte and live about 3000 miles away.  One week on, I’m still thinking about the awesome fried chicken sandwich. It was distinctive, cooked perfectly and came in an excellent delicious bun.  The garnish, while simple and straightforward, did not complicate the taste of the sandwich.  Any more would have ruined the balance. I was  trying to think of a better chicken sandwich I might have had before but couldn’t think of one.  Their beer is great too.  My wife prefers hard seltzer to beer.  Hers was the best I’ve ever tried.  Bartender was friendly and cool.  And I love dogs, of which there were many hanging out.  This place is awesome and should be frequented regularly by those lucky enough to live close by.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, Jesse! Your review just made our day, and our Kitchen team is doing a little happy dance over here. We're thrilled to hear that our fried chicken sandwich left a lasting impression for you, and we're blushing over your kind words. We're all about that balance, so we're delighted it hit the spot for you. We're honored you took the time to share your experience, especially considering you're 3000 miles away! Next time you're in Charlotte, we'll have another awesome sandwich (or two) and a cold beverage waiting for you. Cheers to tasty memories and safe travels!

reviews_data.review_text: Come here when I venture down to Charlotte.. Great beer and the Fried Chicken sandwich cannot be topped... Dog friendly too!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for venturing down to Charlotte, and into Wooden Robot! We appreciate the amazing review, and (while we are biased) we agree our Kitchen makes a mean Fried Chicken Sandwich! We hope to see you again soon, Craig!

reviews_data.review_text: Blown away. Great on all the styles. Czech pilsner was perfect for the style. Solid IPAs but their farmhouse beers have a great depth of flavor and are amazing.. Great staff and great atmosphere. They know their stuff.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for stopping by and for leaving such an amazing review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and found something delicious to try. Our staff is passionate about good beer, and love sharing it with our guests. Barry, we can't wait for you to come back again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Decent beer, bartender was great. Used to New England IPAs so these hazy's were different, not bad but different
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by. We really appreciate your review, and we hope to have a few more beers on tap that better fit your style the next time you visit.

reviews_data.review_text: I really loved their beers on tap. Enjoyed a flight and also had the Wing Wednesdays which is a pretty good deal (8 wings with celery and half fries for $10).
reviews_data.owner_answer: Anindita, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us by trying a few different beers, plus our Wing Wednesday special! We appreciate your kind words and for leaving a review. We hope to see you again soon to check out some other offerings we have!

reviews_data.review_text:
Tasty beers. Laid back vibe. Lovely Staff. Nice selection of Sours. Pet friendly patio.

I seldom drink beer anymore because of the way it makes me feel afterwards (bloated, headache, achy joints, etc.).

However, Wooden Robot is the exception. I have never had any adverse effects after drinking their beer. It is my #1 choice when hanging out in CLT for a pub crawl with friends.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your fantastic experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoy our beers, vibe, and staff. We're honored to be your #1 choice for hangs with your friends in Charlotte. Looking forward to serving you more delightful brews on your next visit. Cheers to good times and great company!

reviews_data.review_text: Lindsey and Brett are the main reasons I come to Wooden. Excellent customer service and make us feel like home. I’ve been the to so many breweries and this one is the hands down the best. The best beer in town as well!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Taylor, this might be the best review we’ve ever received. Thank you. We may be biased, but we think our team is the absolute best to work with! They are passionate about beer and providing a welcoming space for all. We can’t wait to serve you again soon. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Little known fact; the beer has gluten free enzymes which makes a great choice for those with gluten allergies. The food is delicious and the atmosphere is even better.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Shea, thank you for the 5-star review and for sharing a little bit about our beer. We do use an enzyme in most of our beers that significantly reduces gluten content, so our beers are considered “gluten-reduced”. We’re so glad to hear you enjoyed your visit, the food, and the South End location! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Huge space.  Good beer.  Great vibes!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Josh, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us. Thank you for the support and for leaving a review! Our team works hard to keep up with all our thirsty guests, so we appreciate your kind words.

reviews_data.review_text: Great beers and nice experience
reviews_data.owner_answer: Marilyn, we are glad you came out to visit us and enjoyed your experience. Thank you for the review.

reviews_data.review_text: Enjoyed their food and Tuesday night trivia. The fries were delicious!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Summer! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our Kitchen offerings and our Trivia night. We hope to serve you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Came here all the way from Texas, the beers are amazing, the service was awesome gave us very generous samples to try the different beers, and the vibe of the place is really awesome, if you are thinking about coming here, do it, you won’t regret it.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're so honored you chose to visit Wooden Robot on your trip! We really appreciate the kind words towards our team, and we hope you visit Charlotte again soon. We can’t wait to serve you again. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped by while visiting town on Sunday at noon. Not too busy, light and airy atmosphere. Solid iced lavender honey vanilla latte. Would visit again!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by and trying out our new Coffee Bar! We appreciate your kind words and review!

reviews_data.review_text: The place was really cute. We got a flight and while the beers were all ok, I didn’t love any of them. I would still go back and try something else though.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Carlye, thank you for the review. Our team is very passionate and knowledgeable about beer, so we would love to help you find a beer that is perfect for you the next time you visit. We hope you'll stop by again soon and try something new.

reviews_data.review_text: Great beer and dog friendly patio!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and our patio!

reviews_data.review_text: Great spot.  Always good beer and good place to hang out.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming out and joining us for a beer. We hope to see you again.

reviews_data.review_text: Good beer and nice atmosphere. Been there for some really good coffee as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by. We really appreciate your review, and we hope to make it even better for you the next time you visit.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely one of my favorite breweries in CLT!  The cooliest & coziest taproom plus great, friendly bar staff (TJ rocks!!!). Happy drinking!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Cassidy! Cool and cozy is just our vibe! Our staff is passionate about good beer, and we love sharing it with awesome guests, like you. We can't wait for you to come back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Beer and food are excellent. Staff is attentive and kind when the busyness of the business gets in the way. I’ll absolutely be back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! Our staff is happy to serve you and we hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: One of my favorite breweries in Charlotte (and best logo)! I’m currently not drinking and when I went a few nights ago I was very impressed with the NA beers they had on hand!! It’s hard to find breweries that provide NA beer options.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Sarah, we are happy to hear that you stopped in an enjoyed one of our non-alcoholic beer options! Our goal is to provide welcoming space for all to gather, so we appreciate the review about our various beverage offerings. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great food, awesome beer and friendly staff. Highly recommend.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks! We appreciate your kind words and review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Honestly surprised. I know they're known to own a brewery so I didn't know what to expect with the coffee shop.

The scenery was still bar looking. They had food options there which was a surprise. I ordered an Americano. It came out so odd looking but it was smooth and delicious. I'll bring friends here next time.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Pamela! Hope to see you in our taproom again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Went today around 1115 and only the coffee shop side was open at that time.  Sat at the bar for a flight and a pretzel. Service was terrible!! I was never greeted and had to as the bar tender for assistance to get a flight and later to get my check.  She was terribly inattentive! Hopefully the brewery side is better.  Had a flight and a pretzel.  I really enjoyed the Brain Drizzle IPA and the pretzel was on point - soft and buttery. I wasn't a fan of the mustard or cheese. The cheese was very peppery tasting.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thanks so much for stopping by and taking the time to share your experience with us. We’re glad to hear you enjoyed the Brain Drizzle IPA and that the pretzel hit the mark — soft and buttery is exactly what we’re going for! 

That said, we’re really sorry to hear the service didn’t meet expectations. We always aim to provide a warm, attentive experience, and it sounds like we missed the mark during your visit. We appreciate your feedback and will address this with our team to make sure we're doing better moving forward.

We’d love for you to visit the main brewery side sometime soon — different vibe, same great beer! Hopefully we can turn things around on your next visit. Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: It was fine. the main bar wasn't open but sat in the coffee lounge. Beer and food was good
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by and a enjoying a beer in our new Coffee Bar side! We appreciate your kind words and review.

reviews_data.review_text: Wonderful place that has some great beer and food. The staff was super friendly even after they had made a minor mistake on our order.  I would recommend the pretzels and the bao buns.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! We apologize again for the mixup on your food order, but happy to hear we were able to get it resolved and that you enjoyed your meal. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Coffee and beer under the same roof. It doesn't get much better than that. Very friendly staff, good atmosphere, just amazing.
reviews_data.owner_answer: RJ, thank you for the awesome review! We agree, nothing pairs better than coffee and beer in the same place. We appreciate the kind words and hope you'll stop in again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I would definitely skip the food but there is a fun and friendly atmosphere and I love that they also serve coffee.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by and trying our coffee, beer, and food. We appreciate the review and hope you'll give us another shot soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great brewery and coffee shop. Staff was friendly and atmosphere was nice
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your 5-star review!

reviews_data.review_text: Good Morning Vietnam never disappoints!! Great place to have a drink before a Charlotte FC game!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Catalina! We think you nailed that pairing of a Good Morning Vietnam before a fun Charlotte FC game. We hope to see you before the next game soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Good location and beer with nice outdoor sitting
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and for the 5-star rating!

reviews_data.review_text: Very 🐶 dog friendly place and staff - really enjoyed the options that included wine and craft NA beer and seltzers for my prego wife
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Luke! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time, and sampled a few of our offerings. We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Beer is exceptional, service is a delight & the art is so fun! The patio is stunning & the music is🤌 10/10 would recommend.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you! We appreciate your kind words and review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great beers and service!  One of my favorite Charlotte breweries.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great vibes
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and for the 5-star rating! We aim to provide good vibes only.

reviews_data.review_text: Highly recommend! Staff is so friendly, and great atmosphere!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Morgan, we appreciate the kind words and the 5-star review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great spot to hangout. Stafff is super clean, drinks are great, and the place is very clean.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Malik! We appreciate the review and kind words. Our team works hard to keep the place clean and provide an enjoyable atmosphere.

reviews_data.review_text: Best beer in Charlotte 🌹
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Matt! We think you are the best in Charlotte too!

reviews_data.review_text: Good beers good service !
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: My new favorite brewery in Charlotte. The beer selection is great and the food is surprisingly good.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Vijay, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us. Thank you for leaving a review. We hope to see you again soon to try more of our beers and food menu.

reviews_data.review_text: Great selection of beers, always have new ones on the menu. The new kitchen/food is also very delicious. A little pricey for only a sandwich that doesn't come with toppings & is extra. But honestly the food & beer you can't beat. I also LOVE their coffee bar. We all know Charlotte has a million coffee shops, but out of all of them, this one is by far my favorite coffee.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the 5-star rating and support, Natalie. Our beer, kitchen, and coffee bar teams all work hard to provide a positive experience, so we appreciate you leaving a review.

reviews_data.review_text: Good selection of beer, both indoor and outdoor seating!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Great brewery to bring friends from out of town! Good variety of choices for every palate and their food menu was recently revamped.

Super dog friendly and great customer service.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review and for sharing your experience, Emanuel. We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed your visit.

reviews_data.review_text: Great Beer!!! Amazing Food and the staff is off the charts fun
reviews_data.owner_answer: Michael, thanks for the positive review. Our staff is passionate about good beer, food, and having fun, so we thank you for the recommendation!

reviews_data.review_text: I love this place. Staff are so friendly and know their beer. Love the outside patio and it’s a great place to bring your dog. They have big bowls of water for dogs there. The food is yummy too. I recommend the pretzels and sweet potato fries. The beer is so good and great selection!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for stopping by and for leaving an amazing review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. Our staff is passionate about good beer and food, and love sharing it with our guests. We can't wait to serve you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Fun, good food and drinks
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Chillin in the Charlotte cold with the family.  Great atmosphere!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Bill, thanks for stopping by and sharing a beer with us (even on a cold day)! We appreciate your support, and can't wait to serve you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great brewery venue on Charlotte's South End. Great variety of brews and nice food menu options. Bartenders were friendly and hardworking. Kept things clean and smooth on a busy Saturday night. Loved it!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for leaving a review, Ross! We really appreciate the kind words towards our team. They are very passionate about our beer and work hard to keep the brews flowing. We’re looking forward to serving you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: We stopped in with The Funny Bus Christmas light tour and so enjoyed it! The Florida Seltzer was so good!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and for the 5-star review!

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome beer and bartenders !! Ordered food, a burger 🍔 not cheap came with nothing, no fries, no side, no pickle 🥒 I mean absolutely nothing, not impressed, not right!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review, Jeff. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our beer. We're sorry to hear our food did not meet your standards. Our menu is made from scratch with local ingredients and à la carte, so you can pair your food and beer together. We do try our best to let that be known on the menu, but we apologize if this was not clearly detailed.

reviews_data.review_text: Good food and great selection on draft
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by and leaving a review, Phil. We hope to see you again.

reviews_data.review_text:
Went here Saturday night around 7. It was very busy but we were served quickly at the bar. We found a seat and our food was delivered pretty quickly.
The food was good, staff friendly, and there was ample seating.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming into the brewery and leaving a 5-star review. Your recommendation means a lot to us. We hope to serve you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great atmosphere and great servers
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Melissa! We hope to see you in our taproom again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome brewery! I had the prickly pear sour and it was DELICIOUS! I’m a big sour beer fan. The pretzels and chicken sandwich were fantastic as well. This was an awesome dog friendly spot to grab some grub, drink some brews, and catch both college football games as well as some World Cup matches. Would definitely come back again
reviews_data.owner_answer: Jeffrey, we appreciate you stopping by and leaving this awesome review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and found something delicious to try. We're pretty passionate about good beer and food, and love sharing it with our guests. We can't wait for you to come back and visit us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This is my favorite brewery in Charlotte! Keep Pounding.
reviews_data.owner_answer: You keep pounding, Josh -- (beers that is)! We appreciate your support and for leaving a great review.

reviews_data.review_text: Well loved Charlotte brewery with expansive inside and outside seating and a lineup of fabulous beers. Some snacks available too. Inside and covered patio has TVs showing sports. Despite the crowds on weekends service isn’t slow!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Rick, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience with us. Thank you for the support and for leaving a review! Our staff works hard to keep up with all of our thirsty guests, so we appreciate your kind words.

reviews_data.review_text: The beer, great staff, great atmosphere.  What more can you say!
reviews_data.owner_answer: You said it all, Tom! Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review. We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great place with amazing service and plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. Went there to get a coffee and enjoyed the large selection and brewery atmosphere.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by and trying out our new Coffee Bar! We appreciate your kind words and review.

reviews_data.review_text: Joe G on trivia!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hunter, thanks for joining us on Tuesday nights for trivia! We can't wait to serve you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
This place was suggested by our waiter from the pub Ri Ra,  he sent us to the north side but because google walking maps sent us south we landed here. The gentleman behind the counter asked me specific questions regarding “my go to beer flavors”, and thus came up with the winners in a flight that was quite enjoyable and spot on. Truth be told he comped me an extra because he said he liked me. That is true customer service right there, and that beer was my favorite, took one to go AND bought and awesome button down shirt for my hubby. Long story short , My experience with both locations was positive and for those that may have been apart of my experience will be happy to know that the 2X shirt ended up fitting!!! (My husband wears an xl , be sure to check the fit out before just buying your normal size-)
Thanks to the guy with the black hat and the guy checking in the back 👍👍
reviews_data.owner_answer: Christine, we are so happy to hear you had a wonderful first experience with us, and we are so thankful to our friends over at RiRa too for the recommendation. Our staff works hard to keep up with all our thirsty guests, so we appreciate your kind words and amazing review. We are so happy to hear the shirt fit your husband too! We hope you’ll stop by again some time.

reviews_data.review_text: Great atmosphere and even greater beer.  They actually had curry ketchup which was super delicious with my French fries.  Going back again today.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming in and trying out our new Kitchen menu! We appreciate your kind words and for leaving a great review. We hope to see you around more often!

reviews_data.review_text: This is for the FOOD only, the beer is great! But I don't know how a burger can be both dry AF and greasy? The bacon jam is basically just bacon crumble, it seems like they are relying on that in lieu of any condiment. I had to ask for mayo, ( they have sauces for fries so this was confusing) I got some helmanns packets tossed at me.
10/10, you'll have a blast. Shout out to Ashley 💯
reviews_data.owner_answer: 10/10 to you, and your awesome review! Thanks for the support and for the shoutout. We can't wait to serve you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
This place was awesome. Tried a handful of their beers, Fruits of Crime, Cucumber Cooler, Power Synapse, & What He’s having, all fantastic.

Their chicken sandwich was tremendous, great breading, some unexpected spice and then their burger was phenomenal too. Clearly a high quality beef, seasoned well, and incredibly tasty. Can’t wait to go back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for stopping by and for leaving an amazing review, Paul. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and found a few delicious things to try. Our staff is passionate about good beer and food, and love sharing it with our guests. We can't wait for you to come back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great beer choices, good location, spacious inside, and an outdoor covered patio. Definitely going back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming into the brewery and leaving a 5-star review. Your recommendation means a lot to us, George. We hope you'll be back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great beer and wings were 👌
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed your experience.

reviews_data.review_text: This was a good place to hangout, they have nice outdoor seating with roof and plenty of beer options and decent food menu. We went to the place just before their kitchen closing time but not the brewery, we ordered sambal wings which is their garlic pepper sauce and the brat dumplings. We received buffalo wings instead of the sambal wings. I didn't really mind since it was very late but the wings itself were chewy. Dumplings were okay. We also couple of beers psychic dynamite (west coast ipa) beer and it was very good and another one called old world. I think this was a barrel aged ipa and it had a unique taste and I personally wasn't a fan of it.
Fantastic beer and wings! Beer was so good that I almost forgot to take a photo of it for this review lol
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us. We are glad you enjoyed your experience. Oh, and missing a photo because the beer was so good is OK in our books!

reviews_data.review_text: Walker is the best!!! Seriously the best bartender I’ve ever encountered. He was very kind and helpful. :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review and shoutout! Our staff works hard to keep up with all our thirsty guests, so we appreciate your kind words.

reviews_data.review_text: Beer was great and the different styles satisfied my party's varied tastes. Food was tasty without any imperfections. Walker was good to us and shared all his beer knowledge and plenty of little samples so we could make educated decisions. If I was a local I'd be a regular.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, William. We also wish you were local and could stop in again soon. Our staff is passionate about good beer and food, and love sharing it with our guests, so we thank you for the recommendation.

reviews_data.review_text: Staff was very friendly, but not a fan of the beer or the smell of the place. The mixture of coffee and beer being sold inside probably didn't help, but the beer was not great for me.
The beers are great. Liked all that I tried. The Staff is great! A must try for beer lovers!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate you coming out, showing your support, and for your 5-star review!

reviews_data.review_text:
Went here thinking they were open fue to their hours posted.
They were actually closed and did not open till 12:00 noon one guy was rude and cussed us out
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Joanna, we apologize for the confusion. Our main taproom does not open until noon on the weekends, but our Coffee Bar serves coffee, beer, and wine starting at 10 am. The entrance is just on the corner of Summit Ave. and Winnifred St., but we are working on getting more signs to help direct traffic to this door. We would like to hear more about your experience. Could you please send a message to: info@woodenrobotbrewery.com? Thank you.

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing selection and great location
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Nice brewery. Charges for stickers
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate you coming out and showing your support. We hope to serve you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome vibe with plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. Great beer and the soft pretzels are delish!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Carolyn, thank you for stopping by and for leaving an amazing review. We are happy to hear that you found something delicious to enjoy.

reviews_data.review_text: Super nice staff and great beers! Really good atmosphere as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting us and leaving a review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Its has really good beers. And service is awesome
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting and leaving a 5-star review, Pablo. We're happy to serve and hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Wooden Robot Brewery is a great place to grab a drink and chill with your friends. I went for the first time for my friend’s 21st and was not dissapointed. The vibe and atmosphere was very nice and they had a wide variety of drinks on tap. I got the Wulong Tang drink which was pretty good. I wish they had ciders but they have a drink for everyone. I enjoyed sitting on the rooftop and enjoying the views of noda with my friends. Highly recommend if you’re in the area!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting our NoDa location! We're so happy to hear you and your friends had a great time at The Chamber. We appreciate your recommendation and hope you visit again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: In Charlotte for the first time with my husband. Wooden Robot was 12/10 for coffee and beer!
reviews_data.owner_answer: You are 12/10, Samantha! Thank you for checking out our newest endeavor... a coffee bar. We hope you and your husband stop by again soon for coffee, beer, and food!

reviews_data.review_text: Beer is phenomenal, and new space is incredible.

reviews_data.review_text: Great brewery! The place was huge. It had an outdoor patio as well as plenty of indoor seating. The food selection was great, had lots of beer choices, and the service was fast, friendly, and just made the experience awesome. I would highly recommend this place if you're looking for a place to eat or just hang out.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Derek, thank you for stopping in for a bite to eat and a beer with us! Glad you enjoyed your experience, and we hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Busy busy busy but a nice place overall

reviews_data.review_text: Go for the beer and stay for the food! The new kitchen at the Southend location is AMAZING. Best fried chicken sandwich ever (move over Chick fil A) and the curry ketchup for the fries is the only way to eat ketchup from here on out.

We’re thrilled you loved our Kitchen in South End — especially the fried chicken sandwich (we won’t tell Chick-fil-A) and that curry ketchup is definitely a game-changer. reviews_data.review_text: Great beer! Friendly and efficient staff
Really nice place to have a beer and watch  games, animal friendly so nice.

South end is a funny place. Go there on a random week night and you'll never find a parking spot or an open seat but, go there during a holiday week or during a home Panthers game and you've got the place to yourself. Wooden Robot is absolutely one of my favorite breweries (#2) so I have to know when to plan a visit to maximize my time there.
I love that they make a little bit of everything as far as styles go. Their patio is great for dogs and the heaters leave you feeling toasty on a cold day. The food is quick and delicious. Plenty of seating and a large bar top that's accessible from the patio. I could go on and on about this place!

P.s. try to find street parking somewhere around the block.
